statements: SELECT * FROM devices WHERE compliance_status = 'COMPLIANT';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM devices WHERE last_compliance_check > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE compliance_status = 'PENDING' AND firmware_version = '1.0';
SELECT device_name, serial_number FROM devices WHERE device_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE compliance_status = 'COMPLIANT' ORDER BY last_compliance_check DESC
SELECT device_id, device_name, firmware_version FROM devices WHERE serial_number LIKE '%1234%'
SELECT device_name, compliance_status FROM devices WHERE firmware_version IN ('1.0', '1.2', '1.5') AND compliance_status = 'PENDING' ORDER BY device_id
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE compliance_status = 'NON_COMPLIANT' AND last_compliance_check > '2022-01-01'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM devices
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_compliance_status = true;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE compliance_score > 90;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_compliance_status FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile'
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT d.device_name, r.report_date, r.compliance_score FROM devices d JOIN reports r ON d.device_id = r.device_id;
SELECT AVG(compliance_score) AS avg_score, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM reports GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_reports > 1;
SELECT * FROM devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Laptop';
SELECT * FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_result = TRUE;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_details FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, manufacturer FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type, manufacturer, device_id FROM devices;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'laptop';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT report_id, device_id, report_date, report_details FROM reports;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE firmware_version = '1.0';
SELECT id, device_name FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_result = true;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, firmware_version FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung'
SELECT DISTINCT(device_name) AS device, firmware_version FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple' ORDER BY firmware_version DESC
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE firmware_version IN ('1.0', '2.0') AND manufacturer LIKE '%Corp%'
SELECT * FROM compliance_checks INNER JOIN devices ON compliance_checks.device_id = devices.id WHERE compliance_checks.check_result = TRUE
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin'
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_type = 'Sensor';
SELECT device_id, device_name, manufacturer FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceChecks WHERE check_result = TRUE AND check_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, device_id, report_date FROM ComplianceReports WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM IoTDevices WHERE manufacturer = 'Company A');
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_type = 'Sensor';
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT device_type FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_name, device_type, manufacturer FROM IoTDevices WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM IoTDevices;
